title: Broad arrows

properties.name: description
properties.value: Broad arrows can be purchased from any Slayer Master, and are the only arrows which can damage Turoths and Kurasks. Their strength is between mithril arrows and adamant arrows.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Broad arrows
Broad arrows
Released26 January 2005 (Update)
MembersYes
Quest itemNo
Properties
TradeableNo

StackableYes

ExamineArrows with a wider than normal tip.
Values
Value60 coins
High alch36 coins
Low alch24 coins
Weight0 kg
Advanced data
Item ID4160

Broad arrows can be purchased from any Slayer Master, and are the only arrows which can damage Turoths and Kurasks. Their strength is between mithril arrows and adamant arrows.

They require a Slayer level of 55 and a Ranged level of 50 to equip. They can be shot from magic bows or higher.

They can be purchased from any Slayer master for 60 coins each or 35 Slayer reward points for a set of 250. Players can also unlock the Broader Fletching ability for 300 points to be able to fletch their own broad arrows from broad arrowheads and headless arrows. This requires level 52 Fletching and yields 10 Fletching experience per arrow, or 150 experience per set of 15.

Fletching broad arrows is a common method for ironmen to obtain Fletching experience, as the broad arrowheads can easily be bought in bulk while other metals take longer to collect and smith into arrowheads. At high efficiency, up to 42,800 broad arrows can be made per hour, granting up to 428,000 experience per hour. If starting from arrowshafts and feathers, this drops to 21,400 arrows and 235,000 experience per hour.

Dying in the wilderness will turn the arrows into coins at a rate of 2gp per arrow.

'''Broad arrows''' can be [[Slayer reward point|purchased]] from any [[Slayer Master]], and are the only arrows which can damage [[Turoth]]s and [[Kurask]]s. Their strength is between [[mithril arrow]]s and [[adamant arrow]]s.

They require a [[Slayer]] level of 55 and a [[Ranged]] level of 50 to equip. They can be shot from [[magic bow]]s or higher.

They can be purchased from any [[Slayer master]] for 60 coins each or 35 [[Slayer reward points]] for a set of 250. Players can also unlock the Broader Fletching ability for 300 points to be able to fletch their own broad arrows from [[broad arrowheads]] and [[headless arrow]]s. This requires level 52 [[Fletching]] and yields 10 Fletching [[experience]] per arrow, or 150 experience per set of 15.

Fletching broad arrows is a common method for [[Ironman mode|ironmen]] to obtain Fletching experience, as the broad arrowheads can easily be bought in bulk while other metals take longer to collect and smith into arrowheads. At high efficiency, up to 42,800 broad arrows can be made per hour, granting up to 428,000 experience per hour. If starting from arrowshafts and feathers, this drops to 21,400 arrows and 235,000 experience per hour.

Dying in the wilderness will turn the arrows into coins at a rate of 2gp per arrow.
